CustomField.description: Calculated probability based on stage and account type classification. Includes Government LOI date adjustment.
CustomField.formula: CASE(TEXT(StageName), "Stage 0 - Prospecting", 0.02, "Stage 1 - Discovery", CASE(Account_Type_Classification__c, "Government", 0.08, "LOI", 0.17, "Existing Client", 0.18, 0.10), "Stage 2 - SQO", CASE(Account_Type_Classification__c, "Government", 0.12, "LOI", 0.30, "Existing Client", 0.32, 0.20), "Stage 3 - Pilot", CASE(Account_Type_Classification__c, "Government", 0.18, "LOI", 0.40, "Existing Client", 0.42, 0.25), "Stage 4 - Proposal", CASE(Account_Type_Classification__c, "Government", 0.22, "LOI", 0.48, "Existing Client", 0.50, 0.33), "Stage 5 - Negotiation", 0.75, "Stage 6. Closed(Won)", 1.00, 0 ) * IF(AND(Account_Type_Classification__c = "Government", NOT(ISBLANK(Target_LOI_Date__c)), Target_LOI_Date__c > DATE(YEAR(TODAY()), CEILING(MONTH(TODAY())/3)*3, 31)), 0.70, 1.00)
CustomField.label: Calculated Probability
